name: My Pizza Shop 2 - Italian Restaurant Manager Game
name_original: My Pizza Shop 2 - Italian Restaurant Manager Game
description:
Everybody loves pizza!

Open your very own pizza restaurant and dash to be a quick manager and delight every single hungry customer!

Serve the tastiest pizza slices with delicious toppings, cook with all kinds of ingredients to give your clients the true Italian pizzeria experience and turn your shop into a big restaurant business!

Open the dough, spread the scrumptious tomato sauce and melt the cheese as quick as you can: there’s tons of people waiting for a taste of your awesome pizza cooking skills!

HIGHLIGHTS

🍕DASH to serve delicious pizzas to every customer in 100 thrilling time management levels. Be quick to keep everyone happy and satisfied with your cooking!

🍕CHOOSE from many kinds of doughs and use tasty toppings like pepperoni, cheese, shrimp, peppers, eggs, mushrooms, anchovy, olives, onions and many others. So many combinations and recipes to try!

🍕CUSTOMIZE your pizza shop with different items and decorations to create that perfect Italian pizzeria atmosphere!

🍕UPGRADE your kitchen with Soda, Cheese Sticks, Loaded Potato and Chicken Wing machines to expand your pizza shop menu! But beware: if any of them break, you’ll have to fix them fast!

🍕GROW your business and see more and more customers coming to your restaurant as you beat more levels and get ready for spicier challenges!

Make money, spice-up your kitchen and decorate your restaurant to make it look just the way you want. Change the floors, paint the walls, get new trays: you finally have your business, so express yourself in every detail!

It’s the perfect opportunity to show off your cooking and time management skills! Run your pizza shop with efficiency and creativity and turn it into the hottest casual dining spot for families all over town!

Every day is pizza day, so open up your new restaurant now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
